Article.ArticleTitle: Overweight subjects have a higher risk of malnutrition and loss of function after severe COVID infection.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Transversal Nutrition Unit, University of Lorraine, Nancy University Hospital, Vandoeuvre-les-Nancy 54500, France. Electronic address: d.quilliot@chru-nancy.fr.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Declaration of competing interest I declare no conflict of interest in relation with this study.
